name: Update Inventory values in QuickBooks & Google Sheets for new WooCommerce orders
description: Every time a new order is created in WooCommerce, Make will automatically update the inventory values in QuickBooks and Google Sheets. The template uses [this example spreadsheet]( https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1p6ua_qmTJb2XZtIHM_fPf2Amwb9BKXJ_c7EUegT-vMQ/edit?usp=sharing).
